import React from "react"; import "./style.css"; import { Button, Image, Modal } from "semantic-ui-react"; class ModalModalExample extends React.Component{ render(){ return About Us}> About Toledo's Plants
Toledo's Plants is a local run business that specializes in delivering customers high quality plants. We have a plant for any project or need. We have plants that come in all shapes, colors and sizes. Whether you need, flowers for a flower bed, hedges for privacy, or you enjoy the satifaction of eating fruit from a home grown plant.

Have a special plant in mind? Let us know we have connections all over the state and are more than willing to get any plant you need for your project.

Email us
} } export default ModalModalExample;
